Key Match Events: L. Martínez scored the winning goal in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni: 'This team never ceases to surprise'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed by more than an hour due to chaotic scenes outside the stadium
Others: Lautaro Martinez won the Golden Boot with 5 goals
Leandro Paredes made a telling contribution as a substitute
Di Maria knew only too well how it feels to be on the losing side at a major tournament
